class.name: trackers_brubotics/MpcCopyTracker
class.description: This is the MpcCopyTracker and is the original MpcTracker copied from CTU which is only extended with some publishers for plotting graphs.

class.name: trackers_brubotics/DergbryanTracker
class.description: This is the DergbryanTracker which is an implementation of the Distributed Explicit Reference Governor.
